preference.name: NE_relation_rule_grm_list
preference.preference_description: Lists all Generic Relationship Management (GRM) relations that can appear in the Available GRMs list of the New Diagram Template and Edit Diagram Template dialog boxes. These selections determine which relations can be represented in diagrams based on the diagram template. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be the valid model name of a relation, not the display name.
